annotations.description: An early twentieth-century session recipe, the Chrysanthemum cocktail appears, with small variations in proportions, in influential texts like Hugo R. Enss
annotations.title: Chrysanthemum #2 Cocktail | PUNCH

textContent:
Absinthe
2 1/2 ounces dry vermouth, preferably Dolin dry
1/2 ounce Bénédictine
1/4 ounce lemon juice

Rinse a coupe with a small amount of absinthe and dump.
Combine the vermouth, Bénédictine, and lemon juice in a mixing glass, add ice, and stir until chilled.
Strain into the absinthe-rinsed coupe.
